biotools.summary: The package applies a functional version of principal component analysis to postprocess data in wiggle track format, commonly produced by generic ChIP-seq peak callers, by applying FPCA over a set of read-enriched regions (ChIP-seq peaks) and to analyse differential variation between multiple ChIP-seq samples with replicates.

bioschemas.name: NarrowPeaks
bioschemas.summary: The package applies a functional version of principal component analysis to postprocess data in wiggle track format, commonly produced by generic ChIP-seq peak callers, by applying FPCA over a set of read-enriched regions (ChIP-seq peaks) and to analyse differential variation between multiple ChIP-seq samples with replicates.
